name: Cosette
description:
Missing Presents!
It's almost the great Winter Solstice, and everyone is preparing for a grand celebration - but one evening, an odd-looking man arrived in town. Little did the townsfolk know that he was planning to steal all of the children's toys and sell them for big profit. That same night, he went down the chimneys of each home and stole all of the toys inside. The children woke up that night, knowing something just wasn't quite right. They cried and cried, for all of their toys were gone! Fortunately, a brave, young girl decided to get all the toys back and save Winter Solstice.

---

***For the best experience, press F11 once the game has started to enter full screen mode on your browser.

Cosette is a platformer adventure game that you can play on your browser. The game was designed to be played with a keyboard, but it supports Xbox 360-style controllers as well. It is recommended that you use Firefox, especially if you plan on using a controller. No guarantees can be made that other browsers will have controller support for this game.

---

Updates (December 20, 2020)

  • The game now features checkpoints!
  • Item drop rates have slightly increased.
